status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4cnj1","text":"Collect the cells by using TrypLE.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3d5e4","text":"Centrifuge cell suspensions at 450 xg, 4°C for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"231uj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"79C2AB90724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"be33g","text":"Resuspend cell pellets with DPBS and centrifuge following the same indications as in 2. Repeat once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":85,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d5eb7","text":"Discard supernatants and keep cell pellets on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a693u","text":"Resuspend cell pellets in RIPA buffer (RIPA Lysis and Extraction Buffer) supplemented with protease cocktail inhibitors. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7p8sh","text":"Vortex   and keep on ice for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a06uj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"928E7AA0724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"9602E0E0724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3tstc","text":"Centrifuge at 20,000g, 4 °C for  .","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8fl4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"9C2A5930724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fs421","text":"Keep supernatants on ice to proceed with protein concentration determination using the micro-BCA Protein Assay Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fuiks","text":"Loading","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qa35","text":"Mix 10 µg of protein with NuPAGE LDS sample buffer and 5% β-mercaptoethanol final.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6d1d5","text":"Boil for   at 95 °C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7f07a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5hkd","text":"Load protein on pre-cast 4-12% Bis-Tris gels. Include at least one lane with a protein ladder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dddgs","text":"Running","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16stg","text":"Run for and  at 130V in MES buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dleqs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":4800,"guid":"C529F430724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3edqq","text":"Transfer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e9cb1","text":"Transfer onto PVDF membranes using a liquid transfer and following settings: 100V,  , 4°C. Use transfer buffer with 10% methanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fs0c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"CECD9AF0724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"26o0f","text":"Blocking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jadk","text":"  Block membranes with blocking buffer (5% milk powder in 1X TBS and 0.1% Tween20 (REF)) for   at room temperature, 19 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ijr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"E337BD90724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"DF100CE0724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"55nun","text":"Primary antibodies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7eaol","text":"Incubate membrane with primary antibodies in solution (1% bovine serum albumin in 1X TBS-Tween20 (TBS-T) buffer),  at 4°C, 19 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3b6tr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"E6797B10724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dv0b8","text":"Wash membrane three times for   in TBS-T, 19 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a27gd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"F28484E0724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ejail","text":"Secondary antibodies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61mbg","text":"Incubate membrane with peroxidase-conjugated secondary antibodies in solution (1% milk powder in 1X TBS-T) for  at room temperature and, 19 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"df91g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"F7364D20724E11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ftm4t","text":"Wash membrane five times for in TBS-T, 19 rpm.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fs0v1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"0BD31880724F11EDA2F4CFEC87AA77E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8u1uf","text":"Detection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu4v9","text":"Use a chemiluminescence reagent to detect signal and acquire with a Biorad Camera (Vilber Lourmat) and its software (ImageLab).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
